## ğŸ“œ The Five Axioms

| ID      | Axiom                      | Statement                                           |
| ------- | -------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| **Î£.1** | Specification Primacy      | Code satisfies specs; specs satisfy requirements    |
| **Î£.2** | Deterministic Verification | All behavior verifiable through deterministic tests |
| **Î£.3** | Traceable Rationale        | Every decision traces to an axiom                   |
| **Î£.4** | Emergent Complexity        | Complex systems from simple, aligned components     |
| **Î£.5** | AI Symbiosis               | Humans architect; agents execute                    |

## ğŸ§­ Core Principles

- **Axiom-First Design** â€” Every system component derives from explicitly stated axioms
- **Verifiable Reasoning** â€” Decisions can be traced and validated against core principles
- **Spec-Driven Development** â€” Specifications precede implementation
- **Transparent Rationale** â€” Document the *why* alongside the *what*
- **AI-Native Collaboration** â€” Human architects + AI agents = optimal outcomes
